io.sphere.sdk.cartdiscounts

Interface CartDiscountValue

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsoluteCartDiscountValue, FixedCartDiscountValue, GiftLineItemCartDiscountValue, RelativeCartDiscountValue

    public interface CartDiscountValue
    Defines cart discount type with the corresponding value. The type can be relative or absolute.
